籤詩版本二:
Amanzi abandayo, isobho elibilayo elingashisi, angabandayo, angashisi kodwa asivivi
Ukungenzi lutho olunye emhlabeni, ukuba namandla kuzo zonke izinhlobo zobuciko
詩意:
Le hexagram iwuphawu lokusebenzisa kahle izinto.
Konke kuzinzile futhi kuhle.
解曰: Iziboshwa zixolelwe. Isifo sihlangana nodokotela omuhle. Funa ingcebo nethemba. Iziyalezo Noble.
籤詩故事一:
◇Lintong Rescue
Late Sui Dynasty. Inkosi u-Li Yuan yoBukhosi bamaTang yadlula eduze kwesihlahla esitshala i-hillock ngaphansi kweNtaba iLintong. Kungazelelwe, amadoda anamandla amaningi agijima aphuma ehlathini, evala indlela ngemikhonto emide nezimbazo, ehlose ukuwabulala. U-Li Yuan wayezungezwe futhi kwakubucayi kakhulu.
Ngalesi sikhathi, uShubao wayesezozumeka eThempelini laseWyuan, wamangala lapho ezwa umsindo wamadoda namahhashi ememeza ngokufa ngaphandle kwethempeli. Ngokushesha wagibela ihhashi lakhe wagijima waze wayofika phakathi nentaba, kwagcwala intuthu nezintuli yonke indawo ezansi nentaba, kumemeza ukubulalana.
Ngesivinini sombani, u-Shu Bao wagijima wangena wabulala inqwaba yabantu ngokulandelana.Izitha zabaleka macala onke.
Usindise umndeni ka-Li Yuan. Okusho ukuthi, waphinde wasetshenziswa inkosi yaseTang Dynasty. Waba iqhawe owasungula Tang Dynasty.
聖意: Umuzi womndeni uzifunela ingcebo, kanti ukuthengiselana kuwumshado.Kufike owesilisa ohambahambayo emasimini, kuvuthwe izikelemu, kuchume imfuyo eyisithupha.Kufunwa umuntu, kuhlakazeke icala, ukufuduka kube kuhle, futhi impahla elahlekile iyatholakala.Isifo siphephile.Ithuna lasentabeni lihle.
